title: Did Section 54 of the Obama Kerr program come into effect in May 2018?
subtitle: Mimi declares that "art. 54 of Obama's care" will take 30 per cent of social security payments to older persons to cover insurance for undocumented migrants.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Article 54 of the Programme for the Welfare of Older Persons stipulates that 30 per cent of social security payments for older persons will be "transferred" to pay insurance to undocumented migrants as of 1 May 2018.
